

Wayne Steele
June 24, 1998
List of Flora

			
Native

Acorus americanus (Raf.)
sweetflag


Alisma gramineum Lej.
narrowleaf water plantain


Alisma plantago-aquatica L.
American waterplantain


Rhus glabra L.
smooth sumac


Toxicodendron diversilobum
Pacific poison oak


Toxicodendron rydbergii
western poison ivy


Alisma triviale Pursh
northern water plantain


Baldellia ranunculoides
lesser waterplantain


Machaerocarpus californicus
California damsonium


Sagittaria latifolia Willd.
broadleaf arrowhead


Sagittaria subulata
awlleaf arrowhead


Acer glabrum Torr.
Rocky Mountain maple


Acer glabrum var. douglasii
Douglas maple


Acer grandidentatum Nutt.
bigtooth maple


Acer macrophyllum Pursh
bigleaf maple


Acer negundo L.
boxelder


Pacific Madrone
Arbutus menziesii
madrone.jpg


Oregon Grape
Berberis (Mahonia), var.
ogrape.jpg

Blechnum spicantdeer fern

Yarrow
Achillea millefolium L


Vine Maple
Acer circinatum Pursh
vmaple.jpg


Salal
salal.jpg
Gaultheria shallon Pursh


Taxus brevifolia Nutt.
Pacific Yew
pyew.jpg


Artemisia, Var.
Sagebrush

Vitis vinifera L.domestic grape
Zannichellia palustris L.horned pondweed
Phyllospadix scouleriScouler's surfgrass
Phyllospadix serrulatustoothed surfgrass
Phyllospadix torreyiTorrey's surfgrass
Zostera japonicadwarf eelgrass
Zostera marina L.seawrack
Peganum harmala L.Syrian rue
Tribulus terrestris L.puncturevine
Zygophyllum fabago L.Syrian beancaper

			

			
Exotic or Introduced

Picea pungens Engelm
Colorado Blue Spruce


Gleditsia triacanthos L.
Honey Locust


Galium aparine L.
Cleavers; Strangleweed

			

			
Fungi


Death Cap Mushroom
Amanita phalloides


Yellow Morel
Morchella esculenta


Black Morel
Morchella elata


Half-free Morel
Morchella semilibera


Wrinkled Thimble Cap; Early Morel
Verpa bohemica
